name: Electro Cicin's Gleam
title: Electro Cicin Mage: Electro Cicin's Gleam
desc: "Are you... here to play with me?"
inPlayDescription: If your Fatui Electro Cicin Mage who has this card equipped is on the field, before you choose an action: If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Electro Cicin's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) is at least 3, then <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Electro Cicin will immediately deal 1 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG. (<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) will be consumed, once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Electro Cicin Mage at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Fatui Electro Cicin Mage, equip this card.After Fatui Electro Cicin Mage equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Misty Call once.If your Fatui Electro Cicin Mage who has this card equipped is on the field, before you choose an action: If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Electro Cicin's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) is at least 3, then <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Electro Cicin will immediately deal 1 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG. (<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) will be consumed, once per Round)(You must have Fatui Electro Cicin Mage in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
